name: Pan-Fried Shrimp with Lime Butter
author: Miss Amy
summary: Panko-coated pan-fried shrimp with a delicious lime butter that is tasty enough but does not overpower the flavors of the shrimp. Serve over a mixed greens salad or with angel hair pasta with cream sauce and a fresh vegetable for a larger meal.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Mix egg and water together to make a light egg wash
Place breadcrumbs in a shallow dish
Dip shrimp into the egg wash and toss into breadcrumbs
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a pan over medium heat
Add shrimp and fry until firm and opaque, 4 to 6 minutes
Heat butter and remaining 2 tablespoons oil in the pan
Add lime juice; bring to a boil
Return cooked shrimp to the pan and stir to coat with the lime sauce
